      • getDirectConnectionList

        public List<ConnectionRemote> getDirectConnectionList(String locationID,
                                                      boolean waitForData)
                                               throws org.openbase.jul.exception.CouldNotPerformException
        Method collects all connections between this and the given location and returns those instances.
        Parameters:
        locationID - the location id of the location to check.
        waitForData - flag defines if the method should block until all needed instances are available.
        Returns:
        a collection of unit connection remotes.
        Throws:
        org.openbase.jul.exception.CouldNotPerformException - is thrown if the check could not be performed e.g. if some data is not available yet.

      • hasDirectConnection

        public boolean hasDirectConnection(String locationID,
                                   rst.domotic.unit.connection.ConnectionConfigType.ConnectionConfig.ConnectionType connectionType,
                                   boolean waitForData)
                            throws org.openbase.jul.exception.CouldNotPerformException
        Method checks if an direct connection exists between this and the given location.
        Parameters:
        locationID - the location id of the location to check.
        connectionType - the type of the connection. To disable this filter use ConnectionType.UNKNOWN
        waitForData - flag defines if the method should block until all needed instances are available.
        Returns:
        true if the specified connection exists.
        Throws:
        org.openbase.jul.exception.CouldNotPerformException - is thrown if the check could not be performed e.g. if some data is not available yet.

      • getUnitMap

        public Map<rst.domotic.unit.UnitTemplateType.UnitTemplate.UnitType,List<UnitRemote>> getUnitMap()
                                                                                         throws org.openbase.jul.exception.NotAvailableException,
                                                                                                InterruptedException
        Returns a Map of all units which directly or recursively provided by this location..
        Returns:
        the Map of provided units sorted by their UnitType.
        Throws:
        org.openbase.jul.exception.NotAvailableException - is thrown if the map is not available.
        InterruptedException - is thrown if the current thread was externally interrupted.

      • getUnitMap

        public Map<rst.domotic.unit.UnitTemplateType.UnitTemplate.UnitType,List<UnitRemote>> getUnitMap(boolean recursive)
                                                                                         throws org.openbase.jul.exception.NotAvailableException,
                                                                                                InterruptedException
        Returns a Map of all units which are directly or recursively provided by this location..
        Parameters:
        recursive - defines if recursive related unit should be included as well.
        Returns:
        the Map of provided units sorted by their UnitType.
        Throws:
        org.openbase.jul.exception.NotAvailableException - is thrown if the map is not available.
        InterruptedException - is thrown if the current thread was externally interrupted.

      • getUnits

        public <UR extends UnitRemote<?>> Collection<UR> getUnits(rst.domotic.unit.UnitTemplateType.UnitTemplate.UnitType unitType,
                                                          boolean waitForData,
                                                          Class<UR> unitRemoteClass)
                                                   throws org.openbase.jul.exception.CouldNotPerformException,
                                                          InterruptedException
        Method returns a list of all units filtered by the given unit type which are directly or recursively provided by this location.
        Type Parameters:
        UR - the unit remote class type.
        Parameters:
        unitType - the unit type.
        waitForData - if this flag is set to true the current thread will block until all unit remotes are fully synchronized with the unit controllers.
        unitRemoteClass - the unit remote class.
        Returns:
        a map of instance of the given remote class.
        Throws:
        org.openbase.jul.exception.CouldNotPerformException - is thrown in case something went wrong.
        InterruptedException - is thrown if the current thread was externally interrupted.

      • getUnits

        public <UR extends UnitRemote<?>> Collection<UR> getUnits(rst.domotic.unit.UnitTemplateType.UnitTemplate.UnitType unitType,
                                                          boolean waitForData,
                                                          Class<UR> unitRemoteClass,
                                                          boolean recursive)
                                                   throws org.openbase.jul.exception.CouldNotPerformException,
                                                          InterruptedException
        Method returns a list of all units filtered by the given unit type which are directly provided by this location. In case the recursive flag is set to true than recursive related units are included as well.
        Type Parameters:
        UR - the unit remote class type.
        Parameters:
        unitType - the unit type.
        waitForData - if this flag is set to true the current thread will block until all unit remotes are fully synchronized with the unit controllers.
        unitRemoteClass - the unit remote class.
        recursive - defines if recursive related unit should be included as well.
        Returns:
        a map of instance of the given remote class.
        Throws:
        org.openbase.jul.exception.CouldNotPerformException - is thrown in case something went wrong.
        InterruptedException - is thrown if the current thread was externally interrupted.

      • getTemplate

        public rst.domotic.unit.UnitTemplateType.UnitTemplate getTemplate(boolean onlyAvailableServices)
                                                           throws org.openbase.jul.exception.NotAvailableException
        Method returns the unit template of this unit containing all provided service templates.
        Parameters:
        onlyAvailableServices - if the filter flag is set to true, only service templates are included which are available for the current instance.
        Returns:
        the UnitTemplate of this unit.
        Throws:
        org.openbase.jul.exception.NotAvailableException - is thrown if the UnitTemplate is currently not available.

      • getAvailableServiceTypes

        public Set<rst.domotic.service.ServiceTemplateType.ServiceTemplate.ServiceType> getAvailableServiceTypes()
                                                                                                  throws org.openbase.jul.exception.NotAvailableException
        Method returns a set of all currently available service types of this unit instance.
        Returns:
        a set of ServiceTypes.
        Throws:
        org.openbase.jul.exception.NotAvailableException - is thrown if the service types can not be detected.

        Returns:

        Throws:
